Package robot

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommListener
    An interface for something that listens to the obstacle detector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Communicator
    The Communicator connects to the PC through a bluetooth channel and receives/sends messages.
    Controller
    Controls the robot by coordinating messages that come in to the bluetooth communicator with actions that must be performed by the navigator or the locator Also listens to the touch detector and tells the robot to back up when it hits something
    Locator
    Locator class to locate and calculate the Pose
    Message
    The message to be communicated between the robot and the PC
    Scanner
    Scanner class which implements logic for scanning lights and obstacles Adapted from ScanRecorder.java in the skeleton
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    The various message types that can be sent between the robot and the computer.
